s0021: Thus Bo Yi and Shu Qi heard that Western Lord Chang was good at supporting the elderly, why not go and attach to him.
s0022: When they arrived, Western Lord died, King Wu carried the wooden spirit tablet, called him King Wen, east to attack Zhou.
s0023: Bo Yi and Shu Qi grasped the horse and remonstrated saying: 'Father died not buried, moreover to weapons, can this be called filial?
s0024: With minister killing lord, can this be called benevolent?'
s0025: The attendants wished to kill them with weapons.
s0026: The Grand Duke said: 'These are righteous men.'
s0028: King Wu having pacified the Yin disorder, the world revered Zhou, yet Bo Yi and Shu Qi were ashamed of it, righteousness not to eat Zhou grain, hid on Shouyang Mountain, gathered ferns and ate them.
s0029: When hungry and about to die, composed a song.
s0030: The lyrics say: 'Ascending that western mountain, gathering its ferns.
s0031: With tyranny replacing tyranny, not knowing its wrongness.
s0032: Shennong, Yu, Xia suddenly gone, where shall I return?
s0034: Thus starved to death on Shouyang Mountain.
s0035: From this observing, is it resentment or not?
s0036: Some say: 'Heaven's way has no partiality, constantly with good people.'
s0037: If Bo Yi and Shu Qi, can they be called good people or not?
s0038: Accumulated benevolence and pure conduct like this yet starved to death!
s0039: Moreover among the seventy disciples' followers, Confucius alone recommended Yan Yuan as good at learning.
s0040: Yet Yan Hui often was empty, did not reject coarse food, yet died young.
